snippet: The storm has taken a toll on the art galleries between 10th and 11th Avenues in Chelsea, an important part of the arts economy.
abstract: Owners and employees of the numerous art galleries in Manhattan's Chelsea neighborhood assess damage as they clean up after flooding caused by Hurricane Sandy; estimates of damages range, with some artworks irrevocably damaged, and scarcely a gallery left unscathed.

byline.contributor: Randy Kennedy and Carol Vogel contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The storm has taken a toll on the art galleries between 10th and 11th Avenues in Chelsea, an important part of the arts economy.

headline.seo: Hurricane Sandy’s Casualties Include Chelsea Art Galleries
